messages.msgSnippet: Yes!!!!!!!!! I m missing half mine too. :o(  It s when the type is itty bitty. Happens everytime. My stupid computer then tell me it s perfromed an illegal op
messages.messageBody:
Yes!!!!!!!!! I'm missing half mine too. :o( It's when the type is itty
bitty. Happens everytime. My stupid computer then tell me it's perfromed
an illegal op and crashes.
BooHoo,
Michele.
NZ Where it really is hot. Really!

messages.msgSnippet: Tracy, Is it only me?, but I m only getting part of your messages.  So weird. It only pulls in a percentage and then stops.  I ve only noticed it with your
messages.messageBody:
Tracy,
Is it only me?, but I'm only getting part of your messages. So weird.
It only pulls in a percentage and then stops. I've only noticed it with
your messages. Is anyone experiencing this?
Ann


>
